title: Dow futures crash but S&P 500 and Nasdaq remain positive
summary: Stock market futures show mixed performance with Dow futures declining while S&P 500 and Nasdaq futures maintain positive territory, indicating divergent market sentiment across major indices.
content:
The stock market is showing mixed signals in futures trading, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average futures experiencing a significant decline while both the S&P 500 and Nasdaq futures continue to trade in positive territory.

This divergence in market performance highlights the current selective nature of investor sentiment, with different sectors and indices responding distinctly to ongoing market conditions.

The contrast between index performances suggests sector-specific concerns rather than broad market weakness.

source.title: Dow futures crash but S&P 500 and Nasdaq are still in the green; Here's why
